        public static java.io.File getFileInfo()
                                throws java.io.IOException
        getFileInfo Prompts the user to enter the file name to get the file for processing.
        Returns:
        the file object of the file the user is referring to
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • readFile

        public static java.lang.String[] readFile(java.io.File file)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        readFile Prompts the user to enter the file name to get the file for processing.
        Parameters:
        file - file object to be processed
        Returns:
        a string array of all words in the input file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • normalizeWord

        public static java.lang.String normalizeWord(java.lang.String word)
        normalizeWord Makes sure every word is in the same state before checking whether or not it is a palindrome.
        Parameters:
        word - the word (String) to be normalized
        Returns:
        String word, without spaces, punctuation, or captial letters

      • reverseWord

        public static java.lang.String reverseWord(java.lang.String word)
        reverseWord Reverses input to be used to check if the normal word is a palindrome.
        Parameters:
        word - the word (String) to be reversed
        Returns:
        the String input backwards

      • isPalindrome

        public static boolean isPalindrome(java.lang.String word,
                                   java.lang.String wordBackwards)
        isPalindrome Checks if word is a palindrome.
        Parameters:
        word - normal word
        wordBackwards - word backwards (result of reverseWord)
        Returns:
        true or false based on whether or not the word is a palindrome

      • saveLine

        public static void saveLine(java.lang.String line,
                            java.io.PrintWriter pw)
        saveLine Saves a line to the output file (results.txt).
        Parameters:
        line - the line to be saved (a valid palindrome)
        pw - the PrintWriter object to be reused so the file is not overwritten and lines can just be appended.

      • saveResults

        public static void saveResults(int characterCount,
                               int lineCount,
                               double avgWordsPerLine,
                               java.io.PrintWriter pw)
        saveResults Saves final results (stats of input file) to output file.
        Parameters:
        characterCount - the character count of the input file
        lineCount - the line count of the input file
        avgWordsPerLine - the average of words per line of the input file
        pw - the PrintWriter object, to be reused so the file is not overwritten.
